content.question: What is the average value of <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>y</mi> <mo>=</mo> <mi>tan</mi> <mrow> <mo>(</mo> <mrow> <mfrac> <mrow> <msup> <mi>x</mi> <mn>2</mn> </msup> </mrow> <mn>9</mn> </mfrac> </mrow> <mo>)</mo> </mrow> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3F92@</annotation> </semantics> </math> on the closed interval [1.25, 2]?

topic.text: 8.1: Finding the Average Value of a Function on an Interval
